pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:5.1: 29. The training rule on going beyond the time
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:6.2: At that time a family who was supporting the nun Thullanandā said to her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:6.3: “Venerable, if we’re able, we’ll give robe-cloth to the Order of nuns.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:6.4: Just then nuns who had completed the rainy-season residence had assembled to distribute robe-cloth.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:6.6: “Please wait, Venerables. The Order is expecting more cloth.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:6.8: “Go, Venerable, and find out about it.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:6.9: She then went to that family and said to them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:6.11: “Please give the robe-cloth to the Order of nuns.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:6.12: “We’re not able to give robe-cloth to the Order.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:7.1: Thullanandā told the nuns what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:7.4: “How could Venerable Thullanandā let the robe season pass because of an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:7.5: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:7.8: How can the nun Thullanandā let the robe season pass because of an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:7.9: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:7.10: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:8.1: ‘If a nun lets the robe season pass because of an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:10.2: they have said, “If we’re able, then we’ll give, then we’ll act.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:11.2: for one who has not done the robe-making ceremony, it is the last month of the rainy season; for one who has done the robe-making ceremony, it is the five month period.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:12.2: for one who has not done the robe-making ceremony, if she goes beyond the last day of the rainy season, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:12.3: For one who has done the robe-making ceremony, if she goes beyond the day on which the robe-making season ends, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:13.1: If it is an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, and she perceives it as such, and she lets the robe season pass, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:13.2: If it is an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, but she is unsure if it is, and she lets the robe season pass, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:13.3: If it is an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, but she does not perceive it as such, and she lets the robe season pass, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:14.1: If it is not an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, but she perceives it as an uncertain expectation, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:14.2: If it is not an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:14.3: If it is not an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, and she does not perceive it as an uncertain expectation, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:15.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:16.1: The ninth training rule is finished.
